pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Tests // A collection of functions to perform statistical tests of the following methods: Detrended Fluctuation Analysis, RHODCCA coefficient,doi:10.1103/PhysRevE.84.066118, DMC coefficient, SILVA-FILHO et al. (2021) doi:10.1016/j.physa.2020.125285, Delta RHODCCA coefficient, Guedes et al. (2018) doi:10.1016/j.physa.2018.02.148 and doi:10.1016/j.dib.2018.03.080 , Delta DMCA coefficient and Delta DMC coefficient.
